comment.author: 58179182@N03
comment._content: It's Portoni Borsari in Verona, Italy. Itsn't Arco dei Seoni (correctly Leoni)

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Thanks for the info, Bobo Foto. I'll ask our archivist to confirm and then update our cataloging. (This may take a little while...)
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi Bobo Foto,
Our archivist says: 
Thank you for the correct ID. Our descriptions come from the labels found on the lantern slides. We will add your correct ID to our record. It seems this gateway is called both Portoni and Porta Borsari. We'll add both variations.

Thanks for your help!
Deb Wythe
